com.google.inject.tools.suite
Class BlockingProgressHandler

java.lang.Object
  com.google.inject.tools.suite.BlockingProgressHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
ProgressHandler
public class BlockingProgressHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements ProgressHandler

An implementation of ProgressHandler that does nothing to display the progress and blocks the calling thread while it runs.

Author:
Darren Creutz (dcreutz@gmail.com)
